name: Rocket Falls
description:
Rocket falls is a video game made during the "French Game Jam". It's a french point n click narrative game with management features. You are a space commander and you have to save the pilot of a falling rocket. The game is entirely in french. You must play the game in 1920 x 1080. 

Programmer / Game Designer : Valentin GRAS

Artist / Game Designer : Hugues LABORDE

Music : "Welcome to the oude", by Anthox COLLABOY
